content: Hi, I'm c-cube (companion_cube on freenode). I use rust mostly on my free time, OCaml at work, and am specialized in formal logic and automated reasoning. I'm aiming at using rust for SAT solving (already have been doing that for a while) and higher symbolic reasoning with a lot of DAGs and sharing.

Hello and welcome!
You might be interested by https://github.com/rust-lang/chalk then :)
There is also a stream called #wg-traits
I've followed that from afar, thank you! :)
